page.title: 01LANDSCAPE SITUATION
page.content: Our 4km x 3km block is centred on the village of Orton which, as well as the village of Orton, includes the hamlets of Bretherdale and Greenholme (SW), Raisbeck (E), Kelleth (SE) and Longdale (S), as well as numerous individual farms and cottages. The Parish is situated in the south east of the County of Cumbria and until local government reorganisation, in 1974, was in Westmorland. For Local Government purposes it is in the area of Eden District Council. The village is 750 feet above sea level with the ground to the north of the area rising to 1,282 feet. It is a rural area with stock farming _ sheep and cattle _ providing the main occupation for the local population.
